group_1.narration: Students are gathering around the damaged arch,@so any available committee members should@head over there immediately!

group_1.textLeft: Manaka, we're in trouble! The arch is broken!

group_1.textRight: Arch...?

group_1.textLeft: The one they put at the school gate!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, they use that one every year with a@couple of modifications.

group_1.textLeft: We haven't just been using it, we've been@passing it down for generations!
It's the face that's been watching over the@Mizuna Girls' Academy school festival all these years.

group_1.textRight: ...I see, when you put it like that...
...It kind of sounds like a precious thing!

group_1.textLeft: Hurry, Manaka!
A school festival without an arch is like a@steamed bun without red bean paste...
If we don't do something, the school festival@won't be a school festival at all!

group_1.textRight: I don't really get the analogy, but...
It's true that we have no time to waste...!

group_1.textLeft: Wow, what a crowd! Is everyone that worried@about the arch?

group_1.textRight: Or they're simply spectators.

group_1.textLeft: Um...other committee members...
There! Yukika-senpai!
But, I don't see any other committee members@coming...?

group_1.textRight: Your phone has been ringing quite a bit.
I guess everyone's needed elsewhere?

group_1.textLeft: You're probably right...
Let's go, Manaka!

group_1.textRight: What... I'm not a committee member!

group_1.textLeft: We need more people!
Sorry! I'm sorry I'm late!
Tsumugi...and even Manaka...?

group_1.textRight: She dragged me here...
How's the situation?

group_1.textLeft: One of the legs of the arch is broken.
Before we knew it, the foundation seems to have@been ruined...
...Could this be because of my involvement@as well?

group_1.textRight: What...?! You're the culprit behind the@threatening letter?!

group_1.textLeft: Not in that sense...
I believe it's because I have the type of constitution@that easily attracts troublesome matters...

group_1.textRight: So...you didn't send any threatening letters?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I can assure you of that.

group_1.textRight: Then I'm sure it doesn't matter!
Because it's the culprit behind the threatening@letter that's causing trouble.

group_1.textLeft: No, it's possible that the culprit wrote the@threatening letter because of me...

group_1.textRight: If you start talking like that, we'll go in circles!
Anyway, do you think the arch can be fixed?

group_1.textLeft: I just went to examine the arch, but...@I have no idea.

group_1.textRight: Ah, Asuka-senpai! How come you don't know?

group_1.textLeft: I don't know if it has to be completely rebuilt,@or if it can be repaired...
And if we were to repair it, how much time and@materials would it take?
Nobody here who can figure that out...
There's too much trouble and the committee@has their hands full.
There's no one fit to take command here...

group_1.textRight: Come to think of it, you haven't been on@the organizing committee very long.

group_1.textLeft: Our conditions are looking bleak, but I'm@hopeful we can get through this.
There are still so many preparations to be@done for the closing event of the festival, so...

group_1.textRight: We need to figure out what we can do with@the people already here...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Yes, let's do what we can.
Leave it to me! I'll definitely come up with@a good idea!

group_1.textRight: ...Will this turn out okay?

group_1.textLeft: You too, Manaka, think!

group_1.textRight: What...me?
But this kind of thing should be left to the@professionals...

group_1.textCenter: It's no use...@I can't think of anything...!

select.textSelect: Okay...let's change our@perspective! Maybe we can do it@without using an arch...!
I'm more of an eater than a@thinker... I'm getting hungry after@using my brain...
Hmmm...maybe,@we should try to@hold it up ourselves...?

group_5.textCenter: It's no use...@I can't think of anything...!

select.textSelect: Okay...let's change our@perspective! Maybe we can do it@without using an arch...!
I'm more of an eater than a@thinker... I'm getting hungry after@using my brain...
Hmmm...maybe,@we should try to@hold it up ourselves...?
